DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test a unique, combined cognitive and motor intervention designed to restore safe, more normal coordinated gait components into the real world environment for individuals with stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive & Motor Training After Stroke For Everyday Walking Restoration
DOC.criteria: greater than or equal to 6 months post stroke ability to give informed consent impaired gait medically stable pacemaker unstable/uncontrolled medical condition(s)
